Package jUnitTesting

package jUnitTesting
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DataManageAndStorageTests
    Test suite for validating database operations, including CRUD, search, and concurrent access.
    HarmfulInputTests
    Tests showing resilience against SQL injection when using PreparedStatement, and demonstrating the effect of unsafe string concatenation into SQL.
    PostCRUDTests
    Test class focused on Post CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
    PostValidationTests
    Test class focused on input validation for post creation.
    ReplyCRUDTests
    Test class focused on Reply CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
    TerminalOutputTests
    Test class for terminal validation of database I/O boundaries and invalid inputs.
